definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: It adds a new entry to the first line in a file.
sentences.chinese: 它在文件的首行添加一個新條目。

sentences.english: It is a preferred addictive for preparing over-based marine cylinder oil.
sentences.chinese: 是調製高鹼值船用汽缸油的首選添加劑。

sentences.english: The advantages of iron ore-coal pellets covered with iron-concentrate shell are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 論述了礦煤球團用鐵精礦及添加劑包殼的優點。

sentences.english: Blend oils and then add to a bowl of steaming water and inhale for five minutes.
sentences.chinese: 混合油，然後添加到一碗熱氣騰騰的水和吸入五分鐘。

sentences.english: He writes simply and succinctly, rarely adding too much adornment.
sentences.chinese: 樸實簡練，很少添加飾詞。

sentences.english: The optimum recipe for ginger-cake processing was studied with orthogonal design.
sentences.chinese: 以正交實驗研究了添加姜粉蛋糕的配方。

sentences.english: Agnes hasn't added or RSVPed to any events yet.
sentences.chinese: 尚未添加或回覆任何事件。

sentences.english: This article helps you to add a chat system to your environment.
sentences.chinese: 本文幫助您向您的環境添加了一個聊天系統。

sentences.english: You can use fun ice-cube shapes for drinks, too.
sentences.chinese: 同時，你也可以用些有趣的冰塊狀給飲料添加吸引力。

sentences.english: Adds a sequence of connected cubic Bzier curves to the current figure.
sentences.chinese: 在當前圖形中添加一系列相互連接的立方貝塞爾曲線。

sentences.english: Add the correct amount of water and reassemble the percolator.
sentences.chinese: 添加正確的水量和組裝的過濾器。

sentences.english: Some additives and preservatives are essential to keep foods quality and freshness.
sentences.chinese: 一些添加劑和防腐劑都必須保持食品的品質與鮮度。

sentences.english: She returns not to untie her but just to add black tape to her gag and to put her into a hogtie.
sentences.chinese: 她返回不要解開她只是添加黑膠帶嘔吐，把她捆綁。

sentences.english: Adding additives in calcium-based sorbents could improve the sulfur capture capacity.
sentences.chinese: 這可以通過添加助劑等來提高固硫率。

sentences.english: Helper classes allow you to add functionality to your test scripts.
sentences.chinese: 助手類允許您將功能添加到您的測試腳本中。

sentences.english: The Fairmont chefs will start adding it to their foods.
sentences.chinese: 東昌廚師將開始將其添加到他們的食物。

definition: to click (using a mouse or other pointing device)
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to become a member/to join/to mix into/to participate in/to add in
to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
